alert.note: Alert for Southern Twin Falls County; Western Magic Valley (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 09 at 2:05PM MST by NWS Boise
info.description: ...STRONG GUSTY WINDS WILL IMPACT EAST CENTRAL TWIN FALLS AND JEROME COUNTIES THROUGH 245 PM MST... At 201 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a line of showers and accompanying gusty winds over Twin Falls County and Jerome County moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph are possible. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Kimberly, Hansen, Eden, and Rock Creek around 210 PM MST. Hazelton and Murtaugh around 220 PM MST. Milner Dam around 230 PM MST. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Southern Twin Falls County; Western Magic Valley
